text: The COVID-19 pandemic was confirmed to have reached the Democratic Republic of the Congo on 10 March 2020. The first few confirmed cases were all outside arrivals. ==Response== Schools, bars, restaurants, and places of worship were closed. On 19 March, President FÃ©lix Tshisekedi announced flight suspensions. On 24 March, he announced a state of emergency and closed the borders. ==References== Category:2020s in the Democratic Republic of the Congo Democratic Republic
title: COVID-19 pandemic in the Democratic Republic of the Congo
